traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The scorpion cultist has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scorpion cultist makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
